trans-unit.source: Provides an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner" /> 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner" /> for the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 可存取物件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> for the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 可存取物件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.ControlDesignerAccessibleObject" /> class using the specified designer and control.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的設計工具和控制項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.ControlDesignerAccessibleObject" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the points that define the boundaries of the accessible object for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得點，這些點定義設計工具可存取物件的界限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that indicates the boundaries of the accessible object for the designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示設計工具可存取物件的界限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the default action of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，描述指定物件的預設動作。

trans-unit.source: A description of the default action for a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指定物件的預設動作之描述。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation returns an empty string value.
trans-unit.target: 目前的實作會傳回空字串值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the visual appearance of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述指定物件之視覺外觀的字串。

trans-unit.source: A description of the object's visual appearance to the user, or <see langword="null" /> if the object does not have a description.
trans-unit.target: 物件對使用者之視覺外觀的描述，如果物件並沒有描述，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the accessible child.
trans-unit.target: 可存取子系的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the accessible child corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 擷取與指定索引相對應的可存取子系。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the accessible child corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />，代表與指定索引相對應的可存取子系。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of children belonging to an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取屬於可存取物件的子系數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of children belonging to an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 屬於可存取物件的子系數目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the object that has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 擷取具有鍵盤焦點的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that specifies the currently focused child.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />，指定目前焦點集中的子系。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the calling object if the object itself is focused.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件本身是集中的焦點，這個方法會傳回呼叫物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if no object has focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有物件有焦點，則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the currently selected child.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前選取的子系。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the currently selected child.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />，表示目前選取的子系。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the calling object if the object itself is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件本身被選取，這個方法會傳回呼叫物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if is no child is currently selected and the object itself does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前沒有選取子系，且物件本身沒有焦點，則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal screen coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 水平的螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: The vertical screen coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 垂直的螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the child object at the specified screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 擷取位於指定螢幕座標的子物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the child object at the given screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />，代表位於指定螢幕座標的子物件。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the calling object if the object itself is at the location specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件本身位在指定位置，這個方法會傳回呼叫物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if no object is at the tested location.
trans-unit.target: 測試的位置如果沒有物件，則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The object name, or <see langword="null" /> if the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 物件名稱；如果屬性尚未設定，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可存取之物件的父系。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the parent of an accessible object, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no parent object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />，表示可存取物件的父系，如果並沒有父物件，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of this accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個可存取之物件的角色。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole" /> values, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.None" /> if no role has been specified.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole" /> 值；如果尚未指定角色，則為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of this accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個可存取物件的狀態。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" /> values, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.None" />, if no state has been set.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" /> 值；如果狀態尚未設定，則為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可存取物件的數值。

trans-unit.source: The value of an accessible object, or <see langword="null" /> if the object has no value set.
trans-unit.target: 可存取物件的值，或者，如果未設定物件值，則為 <see langword="null" />。
